subject: Cycling, Road
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Books and Literature
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Tyler Hamilton says Lance Armstrong gave him an illegal blood booster before the 1999 Tour de France and that the teammates took blood transfusions together during the race the next year.
snippet: Tyler Hamilton says Lance Armstrong gave him an illegal blood booster before the 1999 Tour de France and that the teammates took blood transfusions together during the race the next year.
